titles.title: To remove the red wolf from the list of endangered and threatened wildlife for North Carolina, and for other purposes.
To remove the red wolf from the list of endangered and threatened wildlife for North Carolina, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of the Interior to issue a rule to remove the red wolf, Canis rufus, in North Carolina from the list of endangered and threatened wildlife.
